This is the website of Clint Wang. I write about mathematics, art, and AI. I am currently an undergraduate student majoring in Computer Science at the University of Texas at Austin.

For information about my site's architecture, see the Site page; for information about relevant sites I like and my contact information, see the Links page; for a list of all posts ordered chronologically, see the Posts page. The design of this website was heavily inspired by Gwern.net.
